div.p:
Curia capitalis balliuorum burgj de Aberdene' tenta in pretorio
eiusdem Octauo die mensis Januarij Anno Dominj millesimo quingen/
tesimo tercio Quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent

head.add: the auditouris of the aldirmannis compt

div.p:
The said day Johne' lesly of warderis Schir Johne' ruthirfurde knicht Robert
blinseile Alexander chamer Johne' of cullane Alexander Rede Johne' of Knollis
Androue cullane ande James collisoun' was chosin be the counsale ande communite
auditouris to her se consider ande vnderstande the comptis of Alexander menyeis
alderman'

Eodem die perlectis tribus processibus per discretum virum dominum Johannem
prat capellanum ac procuratorem altarum Sanctorum crucis ac thome et georgej
martyrum infra ecclesiam parrochialem sanctj nicholaj de Aberdene Situati de et super
recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis cuiusdem terre vaste Jacente infra dictum
burgum in vico Castrj inter terram Johannis Ratre ex australi ex vna communionem
viam regiam ex boreali partibus ab altera et terram alexandrj mathesone
versus occidens et portam communionem versus oriens in defectu solucionis vnius
annuj redditus quatuor solidorum sibi et dicto altarj Sancte S Crucis sibi
a longo tempore debito et non soluto de fundo dicte terre Et in defectu solucionis
vnius annuj redditus tresdecim solidorum et quatuor denariorum sibi et dicto altarj
sanctorum georgei et thome annuatim debito et a longo tempore non Soluto Vnde
dictus Johannes Pecijt a nobis secundum formam et effectum suj processus
precedens Juris et Justcie complementum sibi fierj de eadem terra cum pertinenciis
ad commodum et vtilitatem dictoum altarum Et consequenter dominus Dauid liell
prelocutor dictj domini Johannis porrexit plegium In manibus gilbertj prestone
vnius sergeandorum dictj burgj quod ipse dominus Johannes proprietatem et posses
sionem recuperauit de dicta terra cum pertinenciis in defectu solucionis dictorum
annorum reddituum dictis altaribus pertinentibus vnde hora diej legitime expectata
omnibus Interesse habentibus vocato et nullo de Jure opponenti / decretum fuit et cetera ex ore
Alexandri Joffrasone Judicatoris curie et datus fuit pro Judicio et cetera Testibus gilberto menyeis
Andrea Cullane Johanne Knollys Dauid mar patricio lesly Alexandro
gray patricio Red' dauid straloche magistro Andrea Caidiou Similiter quibus dictus dominus
Dauid nomine dicti Johannis pecijt Justis a me domino Johanne stirueling scriba curie

Eodem die perlectis tribus processibus per discretum virum magistrum alexandrum fyf
capellanum ac procuraotrem altaris Sanctj nicholaij de Aberdene de et super
Recuperacione proprietatis possessionis cuiusdam terre vaste Jacente infra
dictum burgum in le gastraw quondam Symonis masone inter
terram Johannis tailyeour ex australi ex vna et terram quondam
mathej wricht ex boreali partibus ab altera in defectu solucionis
vnius annuj redditus sibi et dicto altarj
annuatim debito et a longo tempore non soluto dicta terra cum pertinenciis
Vnde dictus magister Alexander pecijt a nobis secundum tenorem suj processus
precedens Juris et Justicie complementum sibi fierj de eadem terra cum
pertinenciis ad vtilitatem dicti altaris Et consequenter dictus magister Alexander
fyf porrexit plegium in manibus gilbertj prestone vnius sergeandorum
dictj burgj quod ipse proprietatem et possessionem recuperauit de dicta terra
cum pertinenciis in defectu solucionis dictj Annj redditus vnde hora
hora diej legitime expectata omnibus Interesso vocato habenti vocato et non
comparenti nec de Jure opponenti Decretum fuit per curiam et datam
pro Judicio per os Alexandrj Joffrasone Judicatoris curie quod ipse magister Alexander
causam suam recuperauit et cetera ut supra testibus ut supra

Eodem dei tribus processibus perlectis per discretum vnum dominum Johannem
Kynnynmond' capellanum perpetuum altaris Sancte Katherine virginis infra
ecclesiam cathedralem Abirdonensis situati de et super recuperacione proprietatis
et possessionis cuiusdam terre vaste Jacente infra dictum burgum in le huk
steraw et boreali parte eiusdem vicj inter terram quondam Willelmi gray carnificis ex
orientali et terram quondam domini andree henricj versus boream et communiones vias
regias versus occidens et austrum in defectu solucionis vnius annuj redditus
sex marcarum vsualis monete scocie sibi annuatim debito et a longo tempore non
soluto / vnde dictus dominus Johannes pecijt a nobis vnij formam et effectum
eiusdem processus Juris et Justicie complementum sibi fierj de eadem terra de eadem
terra cum pertinenciis ad et vtilitatem dictj alteris Et consequenter
dominus Dauid liell prelocutor dicti domini Johannis plegium In manibus Willelmi
scrimgeour vnius sergeandoris dictj burgj quo ipse dominus Johnanes proprietatem
et possessionem recuperauit de dicta terra cum pertinenciis in defectu solucionis
dictj annuj redditus Vnde hora diej legitime expectata omnibus Interesse
habentibus vocato et nullo de Jura opponenti / Decretum fuit et cetera ex ore Alexandri
Joffrasone Judicatoris curie et dat' pro Judicio Testibus ut supra

head.add: Judicium processus minister domus sancte trinitatis

div.p:
Eodem die perlectis tribus processibus per Religiosam virum fratrum Johannem
Arnot ministrum domus sancte triniatis de Abirdene de et super recuperacione
proprietatis et possessionis cuiusdam terre vaste Johannis litstar Jacente in vici viridj
inter communionem venellam ex orientali et terram quondam Johnannis Durword ex occidentali
et communionem viam regiam versus boream in defectu solucionis vnius annuj redditus
debito et a longo tempore non soluto Vnde dictus minister pecijt a nobis seruj
vnij formam et effectam suj processus Juris et iusticie complementum sibj fierj
de dicta terra cum pertinenciis ad vtilitatem dictus domus Et consequenter
magister alexander fyf prelocutor dicti ministri plegium in manibus Willelmi scrimgeour
sergeandi dictj d burgj quod ipse ministrum proprietatem et possessionem recuperauit de dicta
terra cum pertinenciis in defectu solucionis dicti annuj redditus Vnde hora
diej legitime expectata omnibus Interesse habentibus vocato et nullo de Jure opponenti
decretum fuit et cetera et dati pro Judicio per os alexander Joffrasone Judicatoris curie
et dati pro Judicio testibus ut supra

Eodem die perlectis tribus processibus per discretum virum dominum Johannem Chamer capellanum
altaris sanctj saluatoris infra ecclesiam perrochialem sanctj nicholaj de Aberdene' situati de
et super recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis eiusdem terre vaste quondam Andree branche
Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico nauium ex australi parte eiusdem vicj inter terram quondam
Jacobi Kyntor ex orientali ex vna et communiones vias regias versus boream et occidens
in defectu solucionis vnius annuj redditus sex solidorum et octo denariorum vsualis monete
scocie sibi et dicto altarj annuatim a longo tempore debito et non soluto de dicta terra cum
pertinenciis Vnde magister thomas chamer procuratorio nomine dicti domini Johnanis pecijt a nobis
secundum tenorem dictus processus Juris et Justicie complementum sibi fierj de eadem terra cum pertinenciis
ad vtilitatem et commodum dictj altaris Et consequenter dictus magister thomas procuratorio
nomine dictj domini Johannis porrexit plegium in manibus Willelmi scrimgeour sergeandj quod tempore dominus
Johannes proprietatem et possessionem recuperauit de dicta terra cum pertinencis in defectu solu
cionis dictj annuj Redditus Reseruatus tantum domino Willelmo crukschank capellano
altaris sanctj Duthacj infra eandem ecclesiam situati vnam annuum redditum quadra
ginta denariorum de dicta terra cum pertnencijs

Eodem die Accedens ad barram dominus thomas lammyntone protestabatur in forma Juris
pro vno annuo Redditu xxxij denariorum vsualis monete scocie sibi annuatim debito pro releuacione
crofti suj de quadam terra penitus vasta quondam Willelmi harpar in futy inter terram quondam
Johannis Waus ex australi et terram Roberti blinsele ex boreali Ad quam terram accedens nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentauit in Curia
tanquam tercio die huius processus Testibus Symone Robertsone Alexandro Nory et Ormundo leslie
sergeando

Eodem die Accedens ad barram Andreas lousone protestabatur in forma Juris pro vno annuo
Redditu xxv s' sibj annuatim debito pro Releuacione terre sue anterioris de quadam terra Interiore
vasta Jacente in vico furcarum Castri ex boreali parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam Willelmi
buchane et orientali ex vna et terram quondam Roberti glenmaluyn ex occidentali partibus ab altera
et terram Anteriorem dicto Andrea quam habet a Johanne malysone versus austrum et
Communionem viam regiam versus boream Ad quam terram Accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam primo die
huius processus Testibus Richardo barnis Alexandro Nory Ormundo leslie sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus andreas collisone capellanus altaris
sanctj stephani prothomartiris infra ecclesiam perrochialem sancti nicholaij de Abirdene et protestatus
fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu sex s' et octo d' vsualis monete scocie sibi et dicto altarj
annuatim debito et a longo tempore non soluto de quadam terra vasta quondam henricj Rany
Jacente in futy inter terram heredum quondam Willelmi Rany ex australi et vna et terram quondam
Willelmi Westland ex boreali partibus ab altera Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit
distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in Sacculo presentauit in
curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Wilellmo Walcar Johanne grene
Wilelmo King et Andrea nachtj sergeando

Burgenses et fratres gilde tempore prepositure Alexandri menyeis Anno domini Millesimo quingentesimo
tercio

Andreas Smitht filius Duncanj smitht Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem
et fratrem gilde Soluet v s' in alba bursa prestito Solito Juramento
Willelmus Watsone recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde pro quinque marcis Inde Soluet xxti s'
Residium per Consilium remittem per Consilium ad Instanciam magistri Andree Cadiow prestito
Solito Juramento
Johannes Watsone allutarius recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito solito Juramento
et Soluet x s' infra hinc et pascha pro quilibet Robertus crag deuenit debitor
Alexander moir' recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito Solito Juramento ac Soluet decanis gilde
s s' infra hinc et festum penthecostes proximum futurum
Johannes Andirsone recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento Ac soluit
Jacobus matlande ad Instanciam vxoris prepositi in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento
Robertus Kennartj recipitur in liberum burgnesem et fratrem gilde prestito solito Juramento et soluto v s'
in alba bursa
Alexander tarras' recipitur in liberum burgnesem et fratrem gilde quia sponsauit filiam
patricij Rede prestito Solito Juramento
Alexander andirsone recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde ad Instanciam domini Johannes blak pro
expensis per eum factis super constructione scole gramaticalis prestito Solito Juramento
patricius Arthour recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde ad requestum domini Johannis stirueling
pro suis excerciis factis penes tulloche et cetera prestitio solito Juramento
Symon michelsone ad Instanciam Alexandri bannerman vicecomitatis deputatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem
gilde prestito Solito Juramento
Andreas portar recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde ad Instancam Johannis Cuk prestito solito Juramento
Robertus arbuthnot de eodem gracia prepositi et consilij recipitur in libertum burgensem et fratrem
gilde prestito Solito Juramento sed secum dispensatur de lott scot wark and warde
Dauid brois' Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fraterm gilde soluto v s'
in alba bursa et prestito Solito Juramento
Robertus arbuthnot de eodem gracia prepostj et consilij recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem
gilde sed dispensatur secum de lott scot ward and warde prestito Solito Juramento
Dauid Anthone Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito Solito Juramento
et Soluto quinque s' in alba bursa
Alexander Rothe tinctor ad Instanciam domini prioris domus fratrem prelocutorem recipitur
in liberum burgensem prestito Solito Juramento
Robertus Jofray ad Instanciam dominj thesaurij abirdonensis in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde recipitur ut Soluit xiiij s'
ad fabricam Stallaris chorj prestito Solito Juramento
Wat /
Dauid straloche Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde
prestito Solito Juramento et soluto quinque s' in alba bursa
Johannes murray recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde Jure paternitatis prestito
Solito Juramento et soluto v s' in alba bursa ut moris est
Alexander bannermane Jure paternitatis reciptiur in liberum burgensem et fratrem
gilde prestito solito Juramento et Soluto v s' in alba bursa
Johnanes Riburne Carnifex recipitur in liberum burgensem quia sponsauit
filiam burgensis prestito Solito Juramento et Soluto v s' in alba bursa
Magister Jacobus Cummyne medicij gracia prepositi et consilij reciptur in liberum
burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento et soluto v s' in alba bursa
Johannes Kennartj alias Rogersone recipitur in liberum burgensem
et fratrem gilde quia sponsauit filiam burgensis prestito solito Juramento
Dauid coupar Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito solito
Juramento et Soluto v s' in alba bursa
Absolon allutarius recipitur in liberum burgensem quia sponsauit filiam
burgensis prestito Solito Juramento et soluto v s' in alba bursa
Karolus Sthevinsone Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem
et fratrem gilde prestito solito Juramento et Soluto v s' in alba
bursa
Willelmus Stile Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem
et fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento et Soluto v s' in alba bursa
Johannes mar' Scissor recipitur in liberum burgensem quia sponsauit
filiam burgensem prestito Solito Juramento et Soluto v s' in alba bursa
Johannes branche recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde Jure paternitatis
prestito Solito Juramento et soluto v s' in alba bursa
Johannes malcome allutarius Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum
burgensem prestito solito Juramento et Soluto v s' in alba bursa
henricus Symsone Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem
prestito solito Juramento et Soluto v s' in alba bursa
Alexander gordone pistor recipitur in liberum burgensem gracia prepositi et
Consilij prestito solito Juramento et Soluto v s' in alba bursa
Johannes balgrischo Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito Solito Juramento
et Soluto v s' in alba bursa
Willelmus bowak carpentarius recipitur in liberum burgensem quia sponsauit filiam burgensis prestito
Solito Juramento et Soluto v s' in alba bursa
Willelmus gregory Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Solito
Juramento et Soluto v s' in alba bursa
Thomas blinsel Jure paternitatis Recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito solito
Juramento et Soluto v s' in alba bursa
Johannes binsele Jure paternitatis in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Solito
Juramento et Soluto vs' in alba bursa
Patricius bannerman ad Instancia Alexandri bannerman de Wattirtoun' vicecomitatis deputatis de
abirdene recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento et soluto v s' in
alba bursa
dominus Andreas Colisone Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fraterm gilde sed
secum dispensatur de lott Scott wark and ward' et cetera prestito Solito Juramento
et Soluto v s' in alba bursa
Duncanus Andirson'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xijo
die Janaurij Anno quo supra

Eodem die Dauid lane per Confessionem lingue propre pro forestallacione
burgi emendo pelles Ac pro regratacione vendendo coram et amerciatur

Eodem die thomas terras' per Confessionem lingue propre amerciatur pro forestallacione
burgi emendo pelles et correa Ac pro regratacione eiusdem vendendo

Eodem die Dauid cristy per Confessionem lingue propre et Coram pro forestallacione
burgi emendo pelles ac pro regratacione vendendo

The saide day the aldirman and ballieis with avis' of the Court Assignit
monunday that next Cumis tile sere Androw Colison' chaplan of Sanct
sthevinnis altar to Cum befor thame and that thai mycht pas' with him to the
land' of William edindeache to se him pund' and distres' for ane
annuele Rent of vj s' et viij d' et se that he did' nay wrang' tharin
tile Ande warnit and chargit Alexander Raneson' allegeande him partj
to Comper the saide day for his Intres'

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' James Colison
forspekar that margaret Kintor the Relict of vmquhile William'
chamer sal pay tile Anthone Ketht tene s' gret vsual money
of flandris beyonde the say or ellis tua franche crovnis her'
quhilk that ples' him best to by him ane caldron' in the complet'
pament of

The saide day Jonhne annande grantit him avand' to Elizibetht
stevart thre quartaris of ane Stane of lynt the quhilkis the
the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law

The said day Johne Dumbrek of that Ilk deponit be his aithe
that his wif bocht ane bassy and ane lavir' fra Anny burnat the
wif of Johne Steuart Ande he herde say that thai war' the saide
Johne Steuartis

The saide day mastir Androu Cadiow procurator tile Elizibeth Iruyn his
modir Offerit him to preiwe that the hous' pertening tile his saide modir
be resone of coniunctfeftment was Castin done or euire William buchan
warnit hir' beseking the aldirman and balyeis to caus' the deliuerance gevin
In the saide matir be reformit agan Ande thai Consentit that ale thing
according to reson' war' done Ande the saide William buchan and patry
rede his forspkar producit ane Act of deliuerance be ane assis' in the
saide matir to the quhilkis thai walde abid' and hald tham at And'
the mastir Androw protestit for remed' of law quhar it efferis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xv die
Januarij anno quo supra

The saide day the Assis' assignit monunday that next Cum be the
moutht of Robert blinsele forspekar to patry chernsid' and his wif
to comper befor the balyeis bringand' with thame the Richtis and
documentis quhilkis thai haue and vys' Anent the croftis follouit be
Cristy prat procurator to Dauy prat

The saide day Alexander lindesay Oblist him be handis and gudis to Comper
this day xv dais and vndirly the law Anent ane meyr' follouit and
clamyt be Williame Ray and' to bring the said meir' to the said'
day with him

The saide day the assis' with Consent of sere Androw Colisone at thar Request
continewit the punding of the lande of vmquhile Williame edindeache
for ane annuele Rent of Sex s' and viij d' clamyt be the saide sere Joh
Androw aving to him as chaplane of Sanct Stevinnis altar becaus' the
aldirman was nocht present

The said' day patry gordone of methtlik procurator to Johne of murray In that
part lauchfullie warnit and nocht comperit tile ansuer' tile ane borghe'
fundin one him be Johne mar' procurator to Johne leslie of warderis for the
wranguis' intrometing and takin out of his hous' of ane kyst with iijC
merkis wortht of gudis quhilkis borghe was fundin in the hande of Androw
nachtj sergeand' tharfor the balyeis ordanit the said' Officiar' to warne the saide patry
to Comper one friday that next cumis tile ansuer' to the said' borghe'

Eodem die Robertus gibsone conuictus fuit per Juratam assiam ex ore Robertj
blinsele prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Walteri Wischeart Cuj emendabit ut
Jura volunt et ordinatum fuit per dictam assisam si prefatus robertus gibsone
dictum Walterum seu quemcumque alium perturbauerit in postrum et inde conuictus
fuerit Soluet fabrice ecclesie xl s' sine remissione

The saide day the balyeis Assignit this day xv dais to thomas
leslie tile ansuer to the borghe' fundin one him be Johne fechat
that he awe to releiwe and freithe him of sere William sanclaris
boit follouit be Johne of mar' Ande tuk to preiwe the saide
day that thomas leslie hede resauit the saide boit fra him one
sere Williame Sanclaris behalf

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Robert
blinsele forspekar that Jonhne fechat awe to deliuer to Johne
of mar' procurator to sere Williame Sanclare the boit with ale
thingis that he resauit with his siclikuis' as Scho was in tyme
that the saide saide Johnhne Intromettit with hir' quhilkis the balyeis
ordanit him to do within terme of lawe

Eodem die Willelmus Sanclar' miles fecit constituit creauit et nominauit Johannem
mar suum legittimum procuratorem actorem et factorem dans et concedens eidem
et suis substitutis pluribus aut vnj suam Integram potestatem ad prosequendum
Johanem fechat pro sua nauicula rebus et necessariis eidem pertinens Ac in
omnibus aliis causis et actionibus ipsum concernentibus agendum defenendum
dictam nauiculam Res et alia que de vita sua petendum exigendum et reci/
piendum de receptis acquitandum promittens de rato et grato in vberiore forma
procuratorij cum ceteris clausis necessariis et oportunis

The said day the baillies chargit Willeame scrimgeour officiar to pas
and' arrest the boyt of Johne fechat to the clame of Johne mar baillie
procuratour to ser Willeame sinclar

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xvijo de
Januarij anno quo supra

The saide day Comperit Johne ogiluy and patry Ogiluy and present in the
Court Jonet trumpat oy tile vquhill Agnes gray and ayr' Ande
schewe how it was Cumin tile thar knavlege that Androw vmfray
hed' gottin ane breiwe seruit in Contrar' the saide Jonet of ane lande
liand' in the gastraw in defalt of null defence tharfor the saidez Johne and
patry Requirit the balyeis that gif thar' cumis ony lettir of Sesin be the
virteu of the pretendit Retour' that thai decist and procede nay forthir quhill
thai mycht ras' the childis brevis forsaide and mak thame be put to
dewe execucioun' as efferis and tharapon' tuk Instrumentis witnes sere Jhone
ruthirfurd' Robert blinsele William vmfray and Jhon' mar' balye

The said day Androw vmfray protestit quhat Jonhne ogiluy and patry
ogiluy did Anent trumpat turne him to nay preiudice

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xix die
Januarij anno quo supra

The saide day Jonhne wilyongsone grantit hym aving to margaret Kintor
xiij s' et vj d' quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of lawe

The saide day the balyeis chargit Jonet Abirdour to pay xxti s' of
annuele for the butht scho Inhabitis and releiwe and keip the said' William
alhous skathles tharanent eftir the tenor of ane Instrument vndir the Seile
of James Colisone balye for the tyme

The said' day Comeprit Alexander gray mastir of the kirk werk oppinlie
declarit that he was redy to resaue ale the malis pertening and assignit
to the kirk werk of thre termes bigane that is to say mertimes witsonay
and mertimes bigane protestande that he mycht haue ane barrel of Salmonde for
euire xl s' that Is vnpait

The saide day Duncan Kethy oblist him his ayris executouris and assignes
be the fathtis of thar' bodiis to content deliuer and pay to thomas chap/
man burges of Abirdene ane barrell of Salmonde full Rede and suet
gude and sufficient merchande gude of the richtuis' bynd' of abirdene
at the fest of Natiuite of Sanct Johne the baptist callit mysommer'
next eftir the dat of this act' or within viij dais thareftir for Redy money
pait to him befor thir witnes Johne tuliboy William scrogis and Williame
Scrimgeor'

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem curie quod Alexnader goldsmyth
filius quondam Willelmi goldmsyth patris sui est legitimis et propinquior heres
dictj quondam Willelmj patris sui

Eodem die Willelmus Sanclar miles fecit Constituit creauit et nominauit
Johannem mar' burgensis dicti burgi suum legitimum et Indubitum procuratorem actorem factorem
et nuncium specialem ad petendum exigendum et recipiendum a Johanne fechat suam nauim
sine Nauiclam et omnia eidem pertinens ac in omnibus aliis causis et actionibus
de receptis acquitandum Agendum prosequendum calumpniandum defendendum et Ceteram omnia
et singula faciendum et excercendum promittens de Rato et grato Cum omnibus aliis
clausulis necessariis et Oportunis
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta die In pretorio eiusdem xxij die Januarij anno quo supra

the saide day patry chernside grantit that he hed' neuir tak of the croftis pertening to
Dauy prat follouit be cristy prat his procurator

The said' day Dauy Rosse sone and appering to the barone of rosse in Angous'
was conuict' be ane suorne assis' for strubulance of the tone of Abirdene for the
quhilkis he was in ane Amerciment of the court et cetera

The saide day Dauy Rosse was conuict' be ane Suorne assis' for brekin of law
borrowis one Androw gaw

the saide day Dauid Adamsone protestit quhat euir cristj prat and his forspekaris
did Anent the lande liand' in the nethirkirkgat turne him to nay preiudice

The saide day mastir Alexander masse forspekar for cristj prat requirit the aldirman
and balyeis that thar' handis be closit in tyme to Cum fra ony Sesin gevin
of the lande quhilkis vmquhile Dauy gichtan Inhabit vnto the tyme
the kingis brevis be resit tharupon' protestande gif ony thing be done
on the Contrar' for Remed' of lawe and askit Instrument witnes sere Jhon'
ruthirfurd' mastir thomas chamer sere Androw Coupar Jhon' annad' patrik Rede and sere Dauy liell

The saide day patry chernside and his wif grantit to pay to cristy
prat procurator to Dauy prat alsmekile maile for the croftis as thai
pait tile vmquhile thomas prat for thame and allegit thai hed'
pait the malis bigan and tuk to preiwe the samyn one friday that
nixt Cumis befor the aldirman and ballieis Ande dischargit tham of the
saide croftis fra Witsonday furtht lesuis' nay thai Compone with
the said' crysty

Eodem die patricuus rede deuenit plegius legalis quod Alexander bannerman de Wattirtone
erit Indempnis pro Johanne ruthirfurde militem aliter quam per viam Juris Et
gilbertus menyeis deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus miles erit Indempnis
pro dicto Alexandro aliter quam per viam Juris

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eisudem xxvj die
Janaurij anno quo supra

The saide day thomas hay deponit be his aithe that John arthour was
Oblist be the fath of his bodie to stande at the deliuerance of androw Cullan'
James Colisone him and Walter hay anent fiwe stane wol clamit by
Androw hay gif thai wald' accorde tham Ande thai accordit and ordanit to
gif him the demi of the saide woll

The saide day the balyeis assignit monunday cum xv dais to Androw hay tile
ansuer to the borghe' fundin one him be Jhone arthour for the wranguis'
haldin fra him of fiwe stane of woll

Eodem dei Andreas hay fecit constituit et ordianuit Johannem ruthirfurd' militem
suum legitimum procuratorem actorem factorem ac nuncium specialem pro se et Nomine suo respondendo plegio
super ipsum per Johannem arthour' porrecto pro iniusta detencione ab eo quinque peciarum
lane agendum respondendum defendendum Calumpniandum prosequendum Ceteram faciendum et excer
cendum In premisse promittens de Rato et grato Cum ceteris terminis necessariis
et Oportunis

The saide day gilbert menyeis and Williame thomsone in frendracht
oblist thame be the fathtis of thar bodiis g thar ayris executoris assigneis
tile obserue and keipe sere Jhone blak his ayris executoris and assignez' skathtles
of the chartiris of the lande of Walter atkin as lawe will coniunctlie
and Seueralie Ande the saide Williame thomsone and Johne thomson burges
of this burghe his brothir Oblist thame and Ilkan of tham thar' ayris executoris
and assignez' tile keipe the saide gilbert his ayris execuoris and skathles thar Anent
ande Johne thomson' Oblist him to frieth bath the saide gilbert and William
of the said' chartiris In tym' to Cum

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vicesimonono die
mensis Januarij anno quo supra

Eodem die Compertum fuit per Inquisicionem Curie quod Johnanes Andirsone est filius
et legitimis heres quondam Willelmj Andirsone patris suj quequodam Inquisico
balliuis ut Inuestarent et sasirent dominum Johannem in consimili possessione et sasina terrarum
et annorum ut dictus quondam Willelmus pater suus prius exciterat et fuerat Et notauerat
in terra quadam Jacente in vico inferiori ecclesie inter terram georgei bisset ex orientali et
terram dominj Johannis litstar ex occidentali

The saide day the ballieis with auys' of the aldirman and counsale Assignit tuysday
the sext day of the monetht of februar' next to Cum to sere Androw Colisone
chaplane of Sanctis Stewynis altar to pas' with him to the lande of vmquhile
Williame edindeache to pvnd' the saide lande for ane annuele Rent of
ij s' viij d' aving to him as he allegis and to se that he do nay wrang in his
punding ande warnit Alexander Ranisone present in the saide court to Comper
for his Entres' and he plesit to se Justice be ministerit In the premiss' say
that in the fundin of the borghe' of fresch deforce the kingis profit be nocht conselit

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis ordanit the skinnaris and walcaris
tile vphalde and Sustene thar' part of Candilmes' that is Aucht
and wount the empriour et cetera Ande thai lesit and gif thame charge tile extent
ale vnfre personis of thar craftis eftir the faculte of thar' gudis and to
rais' the samyn and gif neid' be to compel and distrenye tharfor to the vphaldin
of thar part of the said' play

The saide day the aldirman and ballieis assignit monunday the xix
day of februar' next to Cum to Jonhne fechat to preiwe Suficientlie
befor thame that thomas leslie hede resauit the boit pertinening to sere William
Sanclar' fra him with batht thar Consentis
Curia ballivorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In preotrio eiusdem penultimo die Januarij

The said day Johnne' glenny in the nam' of his wif be his avin tounge grant
was in ane amerciament of the court for the tappin of meile in vndewe tym or
It was present to the mercat

Curia balliuorum burgj de aberdene' tenta in pretorio eiusdem tercio die
mensis februarij Anno quo supra et cetera

The said day It was deliuuerit be ane suorn' assis' patry red' forspekar
that Alexander coupar was in ane amerciament of the court for brekin of commoun
ordinance of the tovne be caus he kepit nocht the processione of candilmes'
play siclik as vthir craftismen' did

William belty Williame blinsele and Androw mortimar be thar avin tounge grant
was Ilkan' in amerciament of the court for the brekin of common' ordinance becaus
thai kepit nocht the processione in candilmes' play
